Uses of Interface
org.apache.shiro.util.PatternMatcher

Packages that use PatternMatcher
org.apache.shiro.util Your run-of-the-mill 'util' pacakge for components and logic widely used across the framework that can't find their home into a proper OO hierarchy (or, most likely for things used across many hierarchies). 
org.apache.shiro.web.filter Base package supporting all Servlet Filter implementations used to control access to web pages and URL resources. 
org.apache.shiro.web.filter.mgt The filter 'mgt' (management) package contains components used in managing Filters that are available for filter chain construction, the filter chains themselves, as well as resolving filter chains based by name. 
 

Uses of PatternMatcher in org.apache.shiro.util
 

Classes in org.apache.shiro.util that implement PatternMatcher
 class AntPathMatcher
          PathMatcher implementation for Ant-style path patterns.
 class RegExPatternMatcher
          PatternMatcher implementation that uses standard java.util.regex objects.
 

Uses of PatternMatcher in org.apache.shiro.web.filter
 

Fields in org.apache.shiro.web.filter declared as PatternMatcher
protected  PatternMatcher PathMatchingFilter.pathMatcher
          PatternMatcher used in determining which paths to react to for a given request.
 

Uses of PatternMatcher in org.apache.shiro.web.filter.mgt
 

Methods in org.apache.shiro.web.filter.mgt that return PatternMatcher
 PatternMatcher PathMatchingFilterChainResolver.getPathMatcher()
          Returns the PatternMatcher used when determining if an incoming request's path matches a configured filter chain.
 

Methods in org.apache.shiro.web.filter.mgt with parameters of type PatternMatcher
 void PathMatchingFilterChainResolver.setPathMatcher(PatternMatcher pathMatcher)
          Sets the PatternMatcher used when determining if an incoming request's path matches a configured filter chain.
